meanings.sent1: The gneissose rocks in the area had distinct layers.
meanings.sent2: The mountain had a gneissose appearance with its banded layers.
meanings.sent3: The gneissose pattern on the wall looked like a zebra's stripes.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as complex and varied as a gneissose rock.
meanings.sent5: The gneissose texture of the fabric felt rough and smooth at the same time.

meanings.definition: Having a banded or foliated structure like gneiss.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a gneissose painting with layers of colors.
meanings.sent2: The gneissose leaves on the tree rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The gneissose design on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as layered and intricate as a gneissose rock.
meanings.sent5: The gneissose texture of the paper added depth to the artwork.
